input: Additionally, because natural gas steam used in the DRI production process contains fewer impurities than coal steam, Nucor can produce stronger and higher-quality steel than its peers that use pig iron. As a result, Nucor is able to manufacture a wide variety of steel products while other minimill producers typically offer a more limited product portfolio that is predominantly leveraged toward weaker, long-rolled steel products.
